pages.text: The Terrain Mace allows you to fling up and damage living entities around you. It will not damage mobs tamed to you.
The Fist of Fury is a fast attacking gauntlet item. It's ability will grant the user the $(l:archon:effects_enchants/rage)Rage$() effect for 5 seconds.
The Terranean Axe is a deadly axe that gives you 20 seconds of Resistance and $(l:archon:effects_enchants/sturdy)Sturdy$() upon using its ability.
